tool_description: Gloppo Fake API is a collection of developer friendly endpoints for returning randomly generated data for testing purposes.
title: Gloppo Fake API

api_list.name: /people
api_list.description: Get a list of random generated fake people data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gloppo-fake-api1.p.rapidapi.com/people"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gloppo-fake-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
